蕍蕍蕍

蕍字的基本解释

蕍
yú
一种中药草，即“泽泻”。
花盛开的样子。

蕍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yú］
［《廣韻》羊朱切，平虞，以。］
(1)药草名。即泽泻。
(2)花开茂盛貌。

蕍字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蕍； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1057第24
【唐韻】羊朱切【集韻】容朱切，?音俞。【爾雅·釋草】蕍，蕮。【註】今澤蕮。又【爾雅·釋草】蕍、芛、葟，華榮。【註】蕍亦華之貌。

蕍字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蕍字的起名意思

原意是指一种中药草，也可形容花盛开的样子。

蕍
Basic explanation of words
蕍
yú
A kind of Chinese medicinal herb, namely "alisma".
The flowers are in full bloom.
蕍
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yú］
["Guangyun" Yang Zhuqie, Pingyu, to. ]
(1) The name of the herb. Namely Alisma.
(2) The flowers are blooming and luxuriant.
蕍
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Chinese Characters] 　蕍; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1057 24
[Tang Yun] Sheep Zhu cut [Ji Yun] Rong Zhu cut,? Yin Yu. 【Erya·Shuicao】Xun, 蕮. [Note] Jin Zeyu. Also 【Erya·Shicao】Xun, 芛,葟, Hua Rong. [Note] The appearance of Xingyihua.
蕍
Source glyph
Font comparison: Song Ti, Mainland China
Taiwan Minutes
Hong Kong Mingti
Korean Ming Dynasty
蕍
Name meaning
The original meaning refers to a kind of Chinese medicinal herb, and it can also describe the appearance of flowers in full bloom.
yú
I сущ.
бот. частуха восточная (Alisта orientale Juz.)
II прил.
цветущий, пышный, обильный (о растительности)
